attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: Trump hasn’t done anything but ruin the US. It’s supposed to be the land of the free. He is trying to make it okay to discriminate against any race, sexuality, religion, etc and that is not at all okay. Trump...sma

attributes.title: my dog died
attributes.review: my dog, philip (named after alexander hamilton’s son), saw donald trump on the tv. after seeing his face & hearing the sheet he spewed from his mouth, philip died instantly. 10/10 do NOT recommend
